nodes.text: Joi Eicroth was a fair haired female who, for a short time, was the wife of Hiram Drayson.

During the Black Fleet Crisis, Joi was hired to work on the Qella remains found on Brath Qella. An exobiologist, she was a member of Alpha Blue and in 25.5 ABY was a member of a xenobiology team analyzing the Yuuzhan Vong.
